text.input_room_name: Please enter the room name and push create room.
text.input_password: Enter password If you want to set.
text.share_url: You can join the game from this room URL. Please distribute the room URL to the participants.
text.wait_entry_members: Please wait until the participants enter the room.
text.wait_start_game: Please wait for the game starts.

index.message_1: Remote Bingo is an online bingo tool.
index.message_2: You can enjoy real-time bingo games even at remote locations.
index.message_3: In a situation where the COVID-19 is widespread, avoiding eating with many persons is said to prevent infection.
index.message_4: It's also difficult to have a party.
index.message_5: We hope that you can enjoy the atmosphere of a bingo game at a party with remote bingo.
index.message_6: We hope you enjoy it with the online party.
index.how_to_play_1_text_1: First, the game master creates a game room.
index.how_to_play_1_text_2: Set the room name and create a game room.
index.how_to_play_1_text_3: You can also set a password if necessary, such as limiting the number of participating members.
index.how_to_play_2_text_1: Recruit members to participate in the created game room.
index.how_to_play_2_text_2: Distribute the room URL displayed on the screen after creating the room to the members.
index.how_to_play_2_text_3: If you set a password when creating the room, you will also be notified of the password.
index.how_to_play_3_text_1: Participating members will open the room URL distributed by the room creator and enter their name to join the game.
index.how_to_play_3_text_2: If you have a password, enter it as well.
index.how_to_play_3_text_3: When you participate, you will be given a bingo card. Please wait until the game starts.
index.how_to_play_4_text_1: The game master starts the game.
index.how_to_play_4_text_2: You cannot add members after the start.
index.how_to_play_5_text_2: The drawn number will be automatically marked on the participating member's card.
index.how_to_play_5_text_3: The game master can check the winning status of participating members.
